abstracts.cdata!:
The Ningbo Water Management Project will
            extend the sewage pipeline network and enhance the sewage
            treatment capacity in Cixi as well as extend and adjust the
            water supply system in Ningbo City.  The adverse impacts
            from this project include: dust nuisance; damage to
            vegetation; water pollution; excavation waste and soil
            erosion; reduction of water capacity; sludge disposal; risk
            from liquid chlorine; noise pollution; loss of agriculture
            resources; and odor pollution.  Mitigation measures include:
            execution of water source protection regulations;
            controlling chemical fertilizers; treatment of waste water;
            use of excavated stones as concrete aggregate; adoption of
            control chlorinator; reduction in sound level of equipment;
            detaching the sewage pipeline system from the rainwater
            collection system; and planting evergreen arbors to absorb odors.
